duties_responsibilities.duty: Transport Johnsonville's products throughout the country while complying with all state and federal laws and regulations.
Provide exceptional customer service and represent the company.
Drive 2019 or newer tractors and late model Great Dane refer trailers with thorough vehicle safety inspections.
Legally operate in compliance with FMCSA regulations and maintain pre-scheduled appointments.
Maintain clean and professional image as a representative of Johnsonville.
Complete E-DVIR for mechanical conditions in need of repair and communicate any delays to dispatch.

education_certification.credential: 100,000 miles driving experience or completion of a certified truck driving school
